        loader - Loader used to render
        shader - Shader Program used to render
        projectionMatrix - Projection matrix passed to shader
        fbos - WaterFrameBuffers
        dudv - DUDV map location
        normal - Normal map location
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception for if file isn't found or cannot be handled
